name: Shifty Tales
description:
Shifty Tales is an entry to the Staffs Autumn Game Jam,  from Warwickshire College. It was created by four level3 students and an Ex-degree student, with help from the two tutors. The goal is to traverse the dungeon and avoid obstacles by shifting between the 2nd and 3rd dimension. We managed to achieve proof of concept mechanics and art style however, were unable to set up any puzzles. 

Everything was made by us.

WASD - Movement

Space-Jump

Shift - Shift Dimension (Facing a wall)

Credits:

Pip Knoflach

Callum Kimberley-Lax
